parse.title: The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar - The Lord of the Rings

links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)

wikitext.*:
[[Image:The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar - The Lord of the Rings.jpg|thumb]]

'''The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar - The Lord of the Rings''' (To Honor the Silver Anniversary) was produced by [[Middle-earth Enterprises|Tolkien Enterprises]] and illustrated by [[Paul Rivoche]] with images loosely based on those of [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)]].

* ISBN 0-9690890-15
* Dimensions: 13 x 11.75 inches
* Stapled
* Punched hanging hole
* Glossy white, medium-weight paperboard sleeve
* Shrink-wrapped

{{title|italics}}
